greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest number for which InvPhi-Set has 2n-1 entries.
link: Max Alekseyev, PARI scripts for various problems (see invphi.gp there).
formula: a(n) = Min{x; Card[InvPhi[x]]=2n-1}; a(1)=0 because of Carmichael conjecture.
program: (PARI) a(n) = {if (n==1, return (0)); my(k=1); while(#invphi(k) != 2*n-1, k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 13 2020
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, May 23 2002
